params.fieldLayout: The layout of the field, see FieldLayout.sol.
params.keyTuple: An array representing the composite key for the record.
params.tableId: The ID of the table where the record was deleted.

params.dynamicData: The dynamic data of the record.
params.encodedLengths: The encoded lengths of the dynamic data of the record.
params.fieldLayout: The layout of the field, see FieldLayout.sol.
params.keyTuple: An array representing the composite key for the record.
params.staticData: The static data of the record.
params.tableId: The ID of the table where the record was set.

onAfterSpliceDynamicData(bytes32,bytes32.details: Splice operations in dynamic data always reach the end of the dynamic data to avoid shifting data after the inserted or deleted data.

params.data: The data inserted into the dynamic data of the record at the start byte.
params.deleteCount: The number of bytes deleted in the dynamic data of the record.
params.dynamicFieldIndex: The index of the dynamic field.
params.encodedLengths: The encoded lengths of the dynamic data of the record.
params.keyTuple: An array representing the composite key for the record.
params.startWithinField: The start byte position within the field for splicing.
params.tableId: The ID of the table where the data was spliced.

onAfterSpliceStaticData(bytes32,bytes32[.details: Splice operations in static data always overwrite data starting at the start position, so the total length of the data remains the same and no data is shifted.

params.data: The data written to the static data of the record at the start byte.
params.keyTuple: An array representing the composite key for the record.
params.start: The start byte position for splicing.
params.tableId: The ID of the table where the data was spliced.

params.data: The data to be inserted into the dynamic data of the record at the start byte.

onBeforeSpliceStaticData(bytes32,bytes32.details: Splice operations in static data always overwrite data starting at the start position, so the total length of the data remains the same and no data is shifted.

params.data: The data to be written to the static data of the record at the start byte.
params.keyTuple: An array representing the composite key for the record.
params.start: The start byte position for splicing.

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Interface identification is specified in ERC-165. This function uses less than 30,000 gas.

params.interfaceID: The interface identifier, as specified in ERC-165

returns._0: `true` if the contract implements `interfaceID` and `interfaceID` is not 0xffffffff, `false` otherwise

onAfterDeleteRecord(bytes32,bytes32[],by.notice: Called after deleting a record from the store.

onAfterSetRecord(bytes32,bytes32[],bytes.notice: Called after setting a record in the store.
